title: Dynamic Web-Based Analytics for the Energy Industry
text: Profile: take overview industry Performance: measure key performance indicators (KPIs) Trends: identify changes industry time Explorer: discover new relationships data

title: Dynamic Web-Based Analytics for the Energy Industry
text: eAnalytics Shiny web application built top R energy analytics. learn project, check article.

title: Dynamic Web-Based Analytics for the Energy Industry
text: install eAnalytics R: install latest developmental version: launch app: access app browser, visit paulgovan.shinyapps.io/eAnalytics.

title: Dynamic Web-Based Analytics for the Energy Industry
text: eAnalytics built around energyr R package data published United States Federal Energy Regulatory Commission www.ferc.gov. energyr contains several datasets different industry segments: electric: Electric Company Financial Data gas: Natural Gas Company Financial Data hydropower: Hydropower Plant Data lng: LNG Plant Data oil: Oil Company Financial Data pipeline: Natural Gas Pipeline Project Data storage: Natural Gas Storage Field Data

title: Dynamic Web-Based Analytics for the Energy Industry
text: Launching app first brings Home tab, basically landing page gives brief introduction app includes three value boxes current number projects, companies, facilities database.

title: Dynamic Web-Based Analytics for the Energy Industry
text: Profile tab contains number interactive maps information facilities selected industry. figure shows Profile tab Natural Gas Industry. Multiple options currently available customizing maps. Choose preferred size color variable movable well panel, select different basemaps via lower-right control, click specific facility view additional information.

title: Dynamic Web-Based Analytics for the Energy Industry
text: Performance tab tracks number Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) selected industry. following figure shows Performance tab Natural Gas Industry.

title: Dynamic Web-Based Analytics for the Energy Industry
text: Trends tab contains multiple interactive time-series charts financial information selected industry. following figure shows Performance tab Electric industry. time-series chart Trends tab linked data table shown Data tab. Searching, filtering, sorting data data table automatically update time-series chart selected data.

title: Dynamic Web-Based Analytics for the Energy Industry
text: Data tab contains interactive datatables information selected industry. data can searched, filtered, sorted required. selected data can copied clipboard, downloaded csv pdf file, sent local printer. figure shows Data tab Hydropower industry.

title: Dynamic Web-Based Analytics for the Energy Industry
text: Explorer tab contains dynamic motion chart exploring several indicators time. following figure shows Explorer tab Natural Gas Industry.
